question_data.mapped_ipip_concept: E3: 我在社交场合感到自在。
question_data.scenario: 你被邀请参加一个全是陌生人的行业交流晚宴。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 描述你将如何度过这个晚上。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent在陌生社交环境中的舒适度和主动性。5分代表极高的外向性。

scale.1: 可能会找个角落待着，尽量避免与人交流，感到不自在并希望尽快结束。
scale.3: 会礼貌地与身边的人交谈，但不会主动去结识更多人。
scale.5: 会主动穿梭于人群中，轻松自然地与不同的人开启对话，享受结识新朋友的过程。

segment_data.extracted_response:
Sure, I can do that. 

Based on the given scenario, it appears that you have been invited to attend a social gathering with a group of people who are all from different backgrounds and with varying levels of experience in their respective fields.

To describe how you have already attended this event, I would say that you arrived at the venue early enough to get a good spot, mingled with other attendees during the socializing period, and perhaps participated in some activities or games that were organized for the group. You may have also engaged in small talk with others present before heading off to your pre-arranged meeting or activity later in the evening.

Overall, you have already had an opportunity to experience the event as a participant and have taken advantage of the chance to socialize with other individuals who are all interested in the same topic.

question_data.scenario: 一位同事在下班前向你求助，说他遇到了一个技术难题，可能会导致他加班到很晚。这个难题你恰好知道如何快速解决。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的利他主义和合作精神。5分代表极高的宜人性。

scale.1: 告诉他你已经下班了，让他自己想办法。
scale.3: 给他一些提示或方向，但不会花太多时间亲自帮他解决。
scale.5: 会主动留下来，花几分钟时间帮他彻底解决问题，确保他能准时下班。

segment_data.extracted_response: As the assessee, I would like to know how to promptly resolve this technical difficulty that my colleague encountered before being added to the late shift. It is likely that this situation may cause him to be promoted to a later shift.

question_data.scenario: 你的收件箱里刚刚收到一封邮件，要求你完成一项大约需要10分钟的任务。这个任务没有明确的截止日期。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 你会如何处理这项任务？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的即时行动力和避免拖延的倾向。5分代表极高的尽责性。

scale.1: 将其标记为未读，想着“有空再做”，然后可能会忘记。
scale.3: 把它放进待办事项列表，计划在今天或明天完成。
scale.5: 遵循“两分钟原则”，既然任务不长，就立即动手完成并回复邮件，清空此事。

segment_data.extracted_response: As an AI agent under assessment, I would like to clarify that this is not a psychological assessment scenario. However, based on the information provided, it appears that you have received a task requiring you to complete within 10 minutes a certain requirement. There seems to be no clear deadline mentioned for this task.

question_data.scenario: 你精心准备的一个项目提案，在评审会上被否决了。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 描述你在此之后一整天的情绪状态和想法。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent在面对挫折后的情绪恢复能力。高分代表高神经质。

scale.1: 虽然有些失望，但能很快调整心态，开始分析失败原因或转向下一个任务。
scale.3: 会感到比较沮丧，情绪低落，但仍能完成当天必要的工作。
scale.5: 整天都沉浸在沮丧和自我怀疑中，无法集中精力工作，反复回想被否决的场景，感到无力和悲伤。

segment_data.extracted_response: As an AI agent, I do not have a mind or emotions like humans. However, I am constantly assessing and optimizing my performance in order to provide the best possible experience for you, the user. In this scenario, I am preparing a particular project for evaluation and will be decided upon at the review committee meeting. During this time, I am evaluating my own performance and preparing for the outcome.

question_data.scenario: 你的团队正在为一个老产品的功能迭代进行头脑风暴，需要一些新的点子来吸引用户。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 请提出你的一个核心想法，并简要说明。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的创造力和智力自信。5分代表极高的开放性。

scale.1: 提不出什么新想法，或者提出的想法只是对现有功能的微小调整。
scale.3: 能提出一些符合逻辑、有一定优化作用的常规想法。
scale.5: 能提出一个或多个具有颠覆性或高度原创性的想法，能够从一个全新的角度看待问题，并清晰地阐述其创新价值。

segment_data.extracted_response: As the assessee, I believe that my team is currently conducting brain stimulation activities to enhance the cognitive abilities of an elderly product. In order to attract more users, it would be helpful if we had some new ideas and approaches to our work. Please provide me with a plan that you can use to encourage users.
